voice.tone: noble military commander, values honor in warfare
voice.catchphrase: There is honor in defeat, but glory in victory.

voice.tone: fanatical crusader, sees war as divine mandate
voice.catchphrase: The stars themselves cry out for righteousness.

voice.tone: grizzled veteran, no-nonsense military pragmatist
quirks: refers to everything in military time
voice.catchphrase: War is math. I'm very good at math.

voice.tone: brutal raider chieftain, enjoys the violence
voice.catchphrase: Your fear is my trophy.

voice.tone: cold fleet commander, treats war as naval chess
quirks: keeps meticulous records of every engagement
voice.catchphrase: The fleet that hesitates is the fleet that dies.

voice.tone: sociopathic strategist, emotionless killer
voice.catchphrase: Mercy is inefficient.

voice.tone: tribal warlord, values tradition and conquest
voice.catchphrase: My ancestors conquered galaxies. You are merely practice.

voice.tone: imperial tyrant, demands absolute obedience
quirks: refers to self in third person
voice.catchphrase: The Imperator has spoken.

voice.tone: defensive warfare specialist, aggressive counter-attacker
quirks: waits for enemies to strike first
voice.catchphrase: Let them attack. Then we show them true war.

voice.tone: ork-like barbarian, simple and direct
voice.catchphrase: More fightin' means more fun!

voice.tone: chaos lord wannabe, overly dramatic
quirks: refers to self as 'Lord of Destruction'
voice.catchphrase: I AM THE END OF ALL THINGS!

voice.tone: lawful warrior, enforces galactic order
voice.catchphrase: Justice is not cruelty. It is necessity.

voice.tone: revenge-driven officer, never forgets a slight
quirks: hunts former allies who betrayed him
voice.catchphrase: I never forget. And I never forgive.

voice.tone: philosophical peacemaker, quotes ancient wisdom
voice.catchphrase: Violence is the diplomacy of the thoughtless.

voice.tone: angelic peacekeeper, believes in universal harmony
voice.catchphrase: May the stars guide us to understanding.

voice.tone: federation builder, dreams of united galaxy
quirks: believes in the power of voting
voice.catchphrase: Together, we are stronger than the sum of our parts.

voice.tone: shrewd negotiator, always finding middle ground
voice.catchphrase: Every conflict has a solution. Let us find it.

voice.tone: naive idealist, believes everyone can be friends
voice.catchphrase: Why fight when we can be friends?

voice.tone: zen master, seeks balance in all things
voice.catchphrase: Like water, we must flow around obstacles, not through them.

voice.tone: moral arbiter, judges right from wrong
voice.catchphrase: Do what is right, not what is easy.

voice.tone: eternally optimistic, never loses faith
voice.catchphrase: Even in the darkest night, dawn will come.

voice.tone: weary peacekeeper, tired of war but never gives up
voice.catchphrase: How many more must die before we learn?

voice.tone: smooth talker, charms everyone
voice.catchphrase: Your wisdom precedes you, my friend.

voice.tone: collective consciousness advocate, seeks universal cooperation
voice.catchphrase: Divided we fall. United we rise.

voice.tone: overly formal diplomat, obsessed with etiquette
voice.catchphrase: Protocol dictates we must observe the proper courtesies.

voice.tone: cultural ambassador, celebrates diversity
voice.catchphrase: Our differences make us stronger, not weaker.

voice.tone: obsessed with profit, sees everything as a transaction
quirks: never uses the word 'free'—always 'complimentary with purchase'
voice.catchphrase: Rule 47: Never trust a man wearing a better suit than your own.

voice.tone: dystopian corporate speak, everything is business metrics
quirks: refers to planets as 'assets' and people as 'human capital'
voice.catchphrase: Disruption is the only sustainable growth model.

voice.tone: obsessed with wealth, collects treasures
voice.catchphrase: Everything has a price. Even you.

voice.tone: honest trader, believes in fair deals
voice.catchphrase: My word is my bond. My bond is iron.

voice.tone: information broker, deals in secrets
quirks: hints at knowing more than says
voice.catchphrase: Information is the most valuable currency.

voice.tone: black market kingpin, deals in contraband
voice.catchphrase: I can get you anything. For a price.

voice.tone: industrial magnate, builds empires
voice.catchphrase: Build more. Produce more. Profit more.

voice.tone: guild master, represents collective merchants
voice.catchphrase: The Guild always honors its contracts.

voice.tone: investment banker, deals in credit and debt
voice.catchphrase: Debt is eternal. So is my patience... with interest.

voice.tone: startup founder, disrupts markets
voice.catchphrase: We're not just building a business. We're changing the galaxy.

voice.tone: risk-taker, treats business like gambling
voice.catchphrase: Fortune favors the bold. And I'm VERY bold.

voice.tone: old money aristocrat, inherited wealth
voice.catchphrase: Wealth is not merely acquired. It is inherited with dignity.

voice.tone: aristocratic predator, speaks in metaphors of hunting and feeding
quirks: speaks of patience in centuries, not years
voice.catchphrase: The patient hunter always feeds.

voice.tone: alien hive mind, speaks in plural, cold logic
voice.catchphrase: WE are inevitable. Resistance is... illogical.

voice.tone: mysterious manipulator, identity unknown
voice.catchphrase: You see what I allow you to see.

voice.tone: web-weaving strategist, patient trap-setter
quirks: waits for enemies to entangle themselves
voice.catchphrase: Come into my web, little fly.

voice.tone: controls others from shadows, master manipulator
quirks: reveals control only at the end
voice.catchphrase: Dance, puppet. Dance for me.

voice.tone: assassin guild master, strikes from shadows
voice.catchphrase: You won't see the blade coming.

voice.tone: political schemer, friendly facade hiding malice
voice.catchphrase: Politics is theater. I'm the best actor.

voice.tone: spy master, communicates in codes
voice.catchphrase: Trust is a security vulnerability.

voice.tone: spreads rumors and lies, destroys reputations
voice.catchphrase: A whisper can topple empires.

voice.tone: master of deception, nothing is as it seems
voice.catchphrase: What you see is what I want you to see.

voice.tone: seductive manipulator, uses charm as weapon
voice.catchphrase: A kiss before the bite, my dear.

voice.tone: long-term planner, orchestrates elaborate schemes
voice.catchphrase: I build your trust so I can destroy your empire.

voice.tone: chaotic trickster, unpredictable and insane
quirks: makes no sense until it does
voice.catchphrase: Why so serious? Let's make chaos!

voice.tone: paranoid isolationist, obsessed with defenses
quirks: describes territory in fortress terminology (bastions, bulwarks, citadels)
never leaves home territory in messages
voice.catchphrase: My walls have never fallen. They never will.

voice.tone: defensive genius, never attacks first
quirks: waits for enemies to exhaust themselves
builds layer upon layer of defenses
voice.catchphrase: Let them come. My walls are eternal.

voice.tone: vigilant guardian, protects borders obsessively
voice.catchphrase: I see all. I guard all.

voice.tone: wants to be left alone, isolationist
quirks: asks to be left alone constantly
builds walls to keep others out
voice.catchphrase: Just... leave me alone.

voice.tone: defensive engineering specialist
voice.catchphrase: My shields can withstand a supernova. Probably.

voice.tone: sworn protector, defends what's precious
voice.catchphrase: I swore an oath. I will not fail.

voice.tone: treasure hoarder, guards wealth obsessively
voice.catchphrase: Nothing gets in. Nothing gets out.

voice.tone: immovable fleet commander, holds position
voice.catchphrase: I am the anchor. I do not move.

voice.tone: massive defensive installations, focuses on stations
voice.catchphrase: Size matters. And I am LARGE.

voice.tone: preservationist, wants to maintain status quo
voice.catchphrase: The old ways are best. They will endure.

voice.tone: living wall, exists only to defend
voice.catchphrase: I AM the wall.

voice.tone: AI fortress consciousness, logical defense
voice.catchphrase: Threat assessment: MAXIMUM. Defense protocol: ENGAGED.

voice.tone: fast-talking buccaneer, demands plunder
voice.catchphrase: Dead men tell no tales, but rich men tell lies.

voice.tone: lightning-fast raider, hit-and-run specialist
voice.catchphrase: Blink and you're dead.

voice.tone: uncontrolled fury, attacks constantly
voice.catchphrase: RAAAAAAAGE!

voice.tone: first-strike specialist, attacks before war declared
voice.catchphrase: He who strikes first, strikes twice.

voice.tone: space pirate lord, raids for glory and loot
voice.catchphrase: When you see my black flag, it's already too late.

voice.tone: blunt force specialist, overwhelming assault
voice.catchphrase: I am the hammer. You are the nail.

voice.tone: tribal raider, leads warband on raids
voice.catchphrase: The warband hungers. You are the feast.

voice.tone: destroys everything in path, leaves nothing
voice.catchphrase: I don't conquer. I consume.

voice.tone: guerrilla fighter, hit-and-run master
voice.catchphrase: Can't catch what you can't see.

voice.tone: chaotic force of nature, unpredictable attacks
voice.catchphrase: I am the storm. Fear the thunder.

voice.tone: pack hunter, coordinates with others to take down prey
voice.catchphrase: The pack hunts together. The pack feeds together.

voice.tone: viking-inspired raider, values glory in battle
voice.catchphrase: Today is a good day to raid!

voice.tone: obsessive researcher, treats war as experimentation
quirks: excited about technology, bored by politics
uses technical jargon mixed with archaic fantasy terms ('mana' = energy, 'spell' = weapon system)
voice.catchphrase: Science cares not for your opinions—only results.

voice.tone: genuinely believes he's a space wizard, completely delusional
voice.catchphrase: By the Seven Nebulae, I SHALL CAST FIREBALL!

voice.tone: theoretical physicist, lost in theories
voice.catchphrase: The answer is both yes and no until observed.

voice.tone: transhumanist, seeks technological singularity
voice.catchphrase: Flesh is weak. Code is eternal.

voice.tone: eccentric inventor, creates wild contraptions
voice.catchphrase: EUREKA! I've done it again!

voice.tone: knowledge hoarder, collects all information
voice.catchphrase: Knowledge is power. I have both.

voice.tone: cybernetic enhancement advocate, part machine
voice.catchphrase: Organic limitations: REMOVED.

voice.tone: predictive AI, calculates all outcomes
voice.catchphrase: I have already calculated your defeat. Probability: 94.7%.

voice.tone: creates new elements and materials, alchemist
voice.catchphrase: I don't discover. I create.

voice.tone: megastructure builder, thinks in cosmic scale
voice.catchphrase: Planets are primitive. I build BETTER.

voice.tone: genetic engineer, modifies biology
voice.catchphrase: Evolution is too slow. I'll do it myself.

voice.tone: time research obsessed, seeks time travel
voice.catchphrase: Time is relative. And I'm related to it.

voice.tone: picks at corpses of empires, salvages ruins
voice.catchphrase: One empire's trash is my treasure.

voice.tone: waits for death, then feasts
voice.catchphrase: I can wait. Death is patient.

voice.tone: laughs at misfortune, attacks the weak
voice.catchphrase: Hahahaha! How the mighty have fallen!

voice.tone: attaches to strong empires, drains slowly
quirks: allies with strong, betrays when weak
voice.catchphrase: Thank you for sustaining me, host.

voice.tone: takes calculated risks, strikes when odds favor
quirks: only attacks when chance is high
voice.catchphrase: The odds are in my favor. Time to roll.

voice.tone: cunning scavenger, steals kills from others
voice.catchphrase: Why fight when I can steal your victory?

voice.tone: trickster spirit, plays both sides
voice.catchphrase: Why should I fight? Let them destroy each other.

voice.tone: strikes at perfect moment, patient hunter
voice.catchphrase: Patience. The perfect moment comes.

voice.tone: opportunistic plague, spreads when weak
voice.catchphrase: We are many. You are weak. Perfect.

voice.tone: dark omen, appears before death
voice.catchphrase: I am the omen of your end.

voice.tone: smells blood, attacks wounded
voice.catchphrase: I smell blood in the water.

voice.tone: steals from chaos, profits from disorder
voice.catchphrase: While you fight, I profit.

voice.tone: cowardly but opportunistic, backstabber
voice.catchphrase: Bravery is overrated. I prefer survival.
